manifest.name: BMO Chatbot
manifest.description: Generate and brainstorm ideas while creating your notes using Large Language Models (LLMs) from Ollama, LM Studio, Anthropic, Google Gemini, Mistral AI, OpenAI, and more for Obsidian.
